channel.title: Automation on Peter Warnock
channel.description: Recent content in Automation on Peter Warnock

item.title: GitHub Actions - CI/CD for Modern Development
item.description: GitHub Actions is a powerful CI/CD platform that automates software workflows directly in GitHub repositories, enabling continuous integration, testing, and deployment.

item.title: Godog - BDD Testing Framework for Go
item.description: Godog is a Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) testing framework for Go that enables writing human-readable tests using Gherkin syntax, bridging the gap between technical and business stakeholders.

item.title: Playwright - Modern End-to-End Testing Framework
item.description: Playwright is a modern end-to-end testing framework for web applications that provides reliable cross-browser testing, mobile emulation, and powerful debugging capabilities.
